formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: Taxable income (estimate mode): I_{IA}^{tax} = \max\left(0,\; G - D_{pre} - SD_{fed}(status, year) \right) Progressive tax across brackets k = 1..n: T_{state} = \sum_{k=1}^{n} r_k \cdot \max\!\left(0,\; \min(I_{IA}^{tax}, u_k) - u_{k-1} \right) where u_k are bracket upper bounds with u_0 = 0. Local school district surtax: T_{local} = s \cdot T_{state} \quad \text{with } s = \frac{\text{surtax %}}{100} Total Iowa tax and after-tax income: T_{total} = T_{state} + T_{local} I_{after} = G - D_{pre} - T_{total}

variables.meaning: property tax (annual or monthly depending on input)
